post:
**Fliphost.net 1 Year Anniversary VPS Offer**

LowEndTalk Promo Code: OneYear - 50% off all VPS servers

Fliphost.net has been providing U.S. based Shared and VPS hosting for one year now and has just upgraded our Hardware to celebrate. With VPS hosting based In Southfield Michigan and Shared in Jacksonville, Fliphost aims to provide the best hosting experience for all our customers.  

Brand new processors! : Dual E5-26XX

Many Linux templates available (Custom requests accepted)


Upcoming Features:

Hosted DNS (ETA: July)
Daily Backups
Offsite FTP Storage (ETA July)
IPv6 Support (Based on data center availability) 

Promo ends at the end of July!
==========================================

Package Details: VPS1 (OpenVz)
1  Core
512 MB RAM 
20 GB HDD (Raid 10)
50 GB Transfer @ 100mbps
1 x IP
Instant Setup
SolusVM Control Panel
$2.98  p/month (Normal price: $5.95)
